database

Class QMCustomer

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.QMCustomer

  • public class QMCustomer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class QMCustomer.
    Contains database query methods related to customer information
    Assembles statements from parameters and executes the them

      • registerCustomer

        public static int registerCustomer(java.lang.String surName,
                   java.lang.String firstName,
                   java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                   java.lang.String email,
                   java.lang.String adress,
                   int zip_code,
                   int zone_nr,
                   java.lang.String preferences,
                   boolean active,
                   Database database)
        Register new customer.
        Parameters:
        surName - Customer surname
        firstName - Customer first name
        phoneNumber - Customer phone number
        email - Customer email
        adress - Customer adress
        zip_code - Customer zip_code
        zone_nr - Customer zone_nr, must exist in database table 'zone'
        preferences - Customer preferences
        active - Whether customer is active
        database - Database connection
        Returns:
        Customer ID

        surName - Customer surname
        firstName - Customer first name
        phoneNumber - Customer phone number
        email - Customer email
        adress - Customer adress
        zipCode - Customer zip_code
        zoneNr - Customer zone_nr, must exist in databasse table 'zone'
        preferences - Customer preferences
        active - Whether customer is active
        database - Database connection
        Returns:
        true, if successful

        public static java.lang.String[] viewCustomer(int customerID,
                              Database database)
        View customer information.
        Columns by index:
        0 : customer_id - int
        1 : surname - String
        2 : firstname - String
        3 : phone_number - String
        4 : email - String
        5 : adress - String
        6 : zip_code - int
        7 : zone_nr - int
        8 : preferences - String
        9 : active - boolean

        database - Database connection

        String[] of customer information

      • viewAllCustomers

        public static java.lang.String[][] viewAllCustomers(Database database)
        View all customers. Returns a list of all customers in database in a two-dimensional String array
        Columns by second index:
        0 : customer_id - int
        1 : surname - String
        2 : firstname - String
        3 : phone_number - String
        4 : email - String
        5 : adress - String
        6 : zip_code - int
        7 : zone_nr - int
        8 : preferences - String
        9 : active - boolean
        Parameters:
        database - Database connection
        Returns:
        String[][] of customer information
